review: Is fabulous I have 3 and going to buy to more for each room.
author: Hector M Santiago

review: For the lower price compared to other competitors; it has a very good value for features but it does lack a lot of things. My main comparison is against the Roku 3500R Streaming Stick. However, many of the functions such as Google Chrome tab playback and display are very cool and in my opinion very unique to the device.
author: Warwrecker

review: Absolutely love it! Easy to use! Hours of enjoyment!
author: CMarty

review: Easily worth the money. Simple to use and functions well. Almost never run into buffering or connectivity issues.
author: Dalton Guthrie

review: I love google chromecast. i used all the time
author: linda

review: Amazing connectivity. This little nifty streaming stick can do it all! It has all the networks that I would care to watch and setting it up was a breeze.
author: franklin salinas

review: Awesome, great product, exactly what I wanted, works great!
author: Jarrod
